title: Banksy, increased availability of consumer goods

content.question: Which of the following twentieth-century processes contributed most directly to the adoption of the system of cultural values to which Banksy alludes in Image 1 ?

choices.label: The expansion of European empires led to the expansion of market economies worldwide.
Greater industrial productivity and new technologies led to increased availability of consumer goods.
Cold War rivalries led to ideological and economic competition between the Soviet Union and the United States.
The continued volatility of economic cycles led many governments to enact social welfare legislation for their citizens.

content.answer: Greater industrial productivity and new technologies led to increased availability of consumer goods.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
